PHC 6701: R for Data Science // Advanced R

About

These are the written lecture materials for the class PHC 6701 (commonly known as “Advanced R”) at Florida International University’s Stempel College of Public Health.

Getting Started

  • Setting up your computer:
    • Windows: https://derailment.netlify.app/2019-11-01-configure-a-windows-pc-for-data-science/ (ignore the stuff about LaTeX)
    • Mac: https://derailment.netlify.app/2019-10-29-configure-a-mac-for-data-science/ (ignore the stuff about LaTeX)
  • Installing R/Rstudio:
    • Windows: https://derailment.netlify.app/2019-12-10-installing-r-rstudio-on-windows/
    • Mac: https://derailment.netlify.app/2019-11-16-installing-r-rstudio-on-a-mac/
  • Setting up R/RStudio: https://derailment.netlify.app/2019-12-22-configuring-rstudio/
  • If you want help, there is a great community of R programmers on Slack: https://rfordatasci.com/.
